She picked up her pet and put it on her shoulder."He won't scratch 
our armor.  He hasn't scratched mine yet."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, crow_lord@h... wrote:
> Scopronok
> 
> 
> Scopronok saw the rat come up on his shoulder. He started to try to 
> shake the rat off, "Get it off, he might scratch my armor."
